nodes.title: Proposed Legal and Policy meeting agenda for 2023-02-17
nodes.body:
## Meeting Details

- **Date/Time:** February 17th, 2023 @ Friday 1:00 PM ET / 18:00 UTC / 7:00 PM CET
- **Location:** Link should be posted in the `#Legal-Policy` text and voice channel on Discord at least 5 days before the meeting.
- **Moderator:** @OBWANDO 
- **Note Taker** TBA

The [FIG Legal and Policy Meetings](https://github.com/Open-MV/fig-legal-policy/tree/main/meetings) repo contains the history past meetings, including a link to the agenda, recording, notes, and resources.

## Meeting Agenda
Discuss the ethics of users and bots
Discuss UGC and distribution of content gating


## Outcomes from Discussion topics

**Discuss outcomes from agenda**

## Action Items

## Items for next week's meeting

nodes.title: Legal and Policy meeting agenda for 2023-02-10
nodes.body:
## Meeting Details

- **Date/Time:** February 10th, 2023 @ Friday 1:00 PM ET / 18:00 UTC / 7:00 PM CET
- **Location:** Link should be posted in the `#Legal-Policy` text and voice channel on Discord at least 5 days before the meeting.
- **Moderator:** TBA
- **Note Taker** Person

The [FIG Legal and Policy Meetings](https://github.com/Open-MV/fig-legal-policy/tree/main/meetings) repo contains the history past meetings, including a link to the agenda, recording, notes, and resources.

## Meeting Agenda
First meeting and operating
FIG charter discussion
Database Feature triage

**Discuss agenda from proposed topics**

## Outcomes from Discussion topics

Limits of legal advisement and purpose of FIG
Clear definition to be written in Charter for FIG
Define process for outreach to larger organizations as needed, 

## Action Items
